tool_description: Get data based on file extension. This API provides information such as the icon and full name of a specified file extension. The data is sourced from https://fileinfo.com/, which is known for its comprehensive list of file extensions.

api_list.name: details
api_list.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific file extension, including its icon and full name.

required_parameters.name: extension
required_parameters.description: The file extension for which information is requested.
